markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quick Snares](/Feats.aspx?ID=509) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 173 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Snarecrafter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=78) (Level 8)

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4); [Snare Specialist](/Feats.aspx?ID=506)

</column>

---

You can rig a snare in only moments. You can Craft snares that normally take 1 minute to Craft with 3 Interact actions, even if you haven’t prepared them.

<title level="2">Quick Snares leads to...</title>
[Lightning Snares](/Feats.aspx?ID=527)
name: Quick Snares
